about_the_game:
Celestial Odyssey

is a cooperative 2D arcade game with a short but touching plot, where you will need to repair a space bus falling apart on the fly alone or with a friend while flying between tiny planets. Monitor the fuel level, manage to patch up the holes and break the record!

Game

You'll need to fix broken wires, patch holes, replenish oxygen, and use a compass to get your bus back on course. Try not to get stuck in an icy compartment without air, and don't forget to refuel the engine. If the engine runs out of fuel and your speed drops below the speed of light, you'll have to start over.

Plot

On tiny planets, you will encounter bored inhabitants. In a series of short dialogues, find out what happened to the planet's inhabitant and how you can help him. Choose the right words to cheer up or put the interlocutor down.

Cooperative arcade game

Endless game mode, where you can beat your personal record or records of other players. Try to fly as far as possible. It won't be easier with friends - but it will definitely be more fun!
